thread.section_title: Gmail Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gmail | gmail.com
thread.title: ManchesterMan

author: ManchesterMan
title: ManchesterMan
text:
I love Gmail and use it religiously no other app is as good as the Gmail one as far as i am concerned the web interface is cool too, both very easy to navigate and everything is conveniently placed, the only niggle i do have is currently there's only the option to mute notifications manually by going into settings and clicking the silence notifications button why can't gmail do an update with a silence notifications daily from 8pm to 7am for example oh and maybe add the fingerprint password too
then it truly would be perfect
